posts.post_content:
No longer looking for a buyer on the card.. thanks for your interest.

Jamie

Hi Jamie
I am sure approximately a few hundred people will be interested. As you well know a grade of 1 can look really nice or it can be half of a card. Can you post a scan or at least give a very short description of it? thanks
I have the cash if it has no paper loss!:D
Jamie, if you want the best bang for your buck...I'd suggest a live auction.  I can think of 20 guys off the top of my head, including me,  interested in a card like that.

I have just been busy as hell with quarter end for work. I am looking for someone interested in the jennings uzit. No paper loss. Email me if interested. Sorry I didn't get back sooner.  
[url]Blunder19@aol.com[/url]
Jamie, do you own this card?

[quote name="slidekellyslide" post=796084]Jamie, do you own this card?[/QUOTE]

I'd like to know as well. Email sent yesterday requesting scans, haven't heard back.

           Thank you, Tony

You do pretty well posting scans on the pick up thread.  Show us the the Uzit card, you have possible buyers ready.
Thanks,
Bob

I have worked something out already with another member.. so I no longer need a buyer on the Uzit.. 

thanks for everyones interest
jamie

[quote name="slidekellyslide" post=796084]Jamie, do you own this card?[/QUOTE]

I think you got your answer. :)

[quote name="B O'Brien" post=796133]You do pretty well posting scans on the pick up thread.  Show us the the Uzit card, you have possible buyers ready.
Thanks,
Bob[/QUOTE]

If you want to see it, you can find it here...[url]http://sports.ha.com/common/view_item.php?Sale_No=717&Lot_No=81043[/url]

This wouldn't happen to be the card you're selling would it?

[url]http://images.ha.com/lf?source=url%5bfile%3aimages%2finetpub%2fnewnames%2f300%2f5%2f2%2f7%2f4%2f5274851.jpg%5d%2ccontinueonerror%5btrue%5d&scale=size%5b220x350%5d%2coptions%5blimit%5d&source=url%5bfile%3aimages%2finetpub%2fwebuse%2fno_image_available.gif%5d%2cif%5b%28%27global.source.error%27%29%5d&sink=preservemd%5btrue%5d[/url]

Holy smokes!!!!


I almost got played for an idiot folks. After negotiating a deal with Jamie for $1300 for the card, he told me the only caveat was that it "might take a couple weeks" before he gets the card. In our several emails, I was very clear to him that I dont mind waiting, as long as I was guaranteed the card....he said no problems. He never once said he didnt own the card, or that it was in a live auction. He led me to believe he was just waiting on delivery. Basically Jamie was going to use my money as leverage to win that auction without disclosing it to me. VERY deceptive indeed!!! Jamie should be ashamed of these actions. If he needs an "auction partner", he should just ask for that rather than trying to sell a card he may never even own! 


I want to thank the couple of members who "busted" him on this scam. Saved me some potential grief. I know Leon is very tolerant on activities on this BST, but in my opinion, this type of activity is unethical at best, criminal at worst!

Phil
This type of activity is NOT allowed on the B/S/T.

[quote name="Chicago206" post=796152]Holy smokes!!!!


If he needs an "auction partner", he should just ask for that rather than trying to sell a card he may never even own! 



Phil[/QUOTE]

Well, if this is the case, I don't think he will be finding an "auction partner" anytime soon.

Yikes!
